name: Jabra
text:
[On Play] You may rest 1 of your DON!! from the cost area. If you do, this character gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.
[Activate: Main] [Counter: 1000] (You may rest 1 of your DON!! from the cost area) Choose 1 of your opponent's characters. That character's power becomes 0 until the end of the turn.

effect.text: This character gains +1000 power until the end of the turn.
Choose 1 of your opponent's characters. That character's power becomes 0 until the end of the turn.

meta.notes: Rarity is 'C' as printed in the bottom right corner. The card is a sample, so the text and abilities are based on the visible content.
